# fontSize

**Instance Property**

The size of the font used in the label.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var fontSize: CGFloat { get set }
```

```swift
var fontSize: CGFloat { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default font size is 32 points.

## Specifying a Label’s Font

- **fontColor**: The color of the label.
- **fontName**: The font used for the text in the label.
